identity.mission: Create a digital space that feels like a warm hug. Reject cold 'tech' aesthetics for organic, playful, and intimate design.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Dating App' intimacy with 'Game UI' playfulness.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel like a touch.
Softness: No sharp corners. Everything is rounded and approachable.
Negative Space: Let the love breathe.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major calls to action. Roundness = Friendliness.

body.usage: Long form text, messages, and UI labels. Clean but with character.

primary.name: Love Coral
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, hearts, key highlights.

secondary.name: Garden Sage
secondary.usage: Success states, nature elements, secondary buttons.

background.name: Warm Cream
background.usage: Main page background. Never use pure white #FFFFFF.

surface.name: Pure White
surface.usage: Cards, modals, input fields (to create depth against Cream bg).

text.usage: Warm charcoal for text. Never use #000000.

decorations: Dotted grid patterns in background (color #FF8FA3, opacity 0.1)

landing_page.description: Hero section must not be standard. Use floating elements (images of couples, chat bubbles, hearts) scattered around the main headline.

dashboard.description: A cozy home for the couple. Large 'Countdown' block, medium 'Quick Actions' block, tall 'Activity Feed' block.

room_creation.description: Minimalist. Just a massive input field for the code and a 'Join' button. No distractions.

buttons.animation: Scale up slightly on hover (scale-105). 'Bouncy' spring transition.
buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.classes: bg-white rounded-3xl border border-pink-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 p-6

inputs.classes: bg-pink-50/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-pink-100 rounded-2xl h-12 px-4

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Soft Romance' palette. Use the CSS variables provided.
2. FONT SETUP: Import 'Nunito' and 'Outfit' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Hero' that feels like a love letter. Use the 'Happy couple' image with a soft gradient overlay. The CTA 'Create Room' should be massive and pill-shaped.
4. DASHBOARD: Implement the 'Bento Grid'. The 'Countdown' widget is the heart of the dashboard. Make it tick with a soft pulse animation.
5. GAMES: For 'Drawing Board', use a canvas with pastel brush colors by default. For 'Truth or Dare', use flip cards with 'bouncy' transitions.
6. VIRTUAL GARDEN: Display the flower images in a grid. When a user 'sends' one, animate it floating up and fading out.
7. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast is high enough (use the dark charcoal text, not gray). Add aria-labels to all interactive elements.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to every button, input, and card.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.
